text: [dramatic music playing]
[sighs]
Knowing that Micah has chosen to spend the rest of her life with me,
not having ever seen me before,
{\an8}that is a magical thing that I was not entirely convinced
{\an8}existed prior to this.
[exhales]
But is psychological love all you need for a long-term relationship?
What I'm most nervous about is what she looks like
and what she feels like,
because at the end of the day, the feeling is like,
"Are you attracted to them? Do you wanna put your face on their face?"
{\an8}[Micah chuckles] My stomach is in shambles.
I have never been so nervous in my entire life.
My God. [chuckles]
The only thing that would make me walk away from my fiancé
is if I could just see in his face that he was disappointed.
I think that an ego hit like that would probably destroy me. [chuckles]
[chuckling]
-Oh, my God. -[laughing]
What?

Oh, my God.
[Micah laughing] Oh, my God!
Oh, my God. That felt insane.
-Hello! -[laughs] Hey. It's so strange.
Oh, my God. This is so weird! Hello!
-I know. -Oh, my God, hearing your voice.
-My hands are shaking. -I know. Same.
What the hell? Hi.
[Paul] She smelled great. Her hair, her eyes were beautiful.
Makeup was perfect. Her dress was perfect.
And I just… I really want to leave here…
[laughs] …like, right now with her.
Like, I feel like that is, um… should be the order of operations.
Like, cut this interview short. Let's-- let's roll out.
-You're so handsome. -Thank you. Yeah, you're beautiful.
-Thank you. Thank you. -You're honestly beautiful.
Oh, my gosh.

Oh, my God, hearing your voice to your face is so weird!

it… it's insane.
I literally feel like a little kid right now. [laughs]
Like, I cannot stop, like, giggling. Like, I feel so weird. [laughs]
Do you feel like you're sitting with me, or do you feel like it's a new person?
-'Cause I feel like it's a new person. -Yeah, I didn't wanna say that, but yeah.
[laughing] I'll be honest with you. It's okay.
Yeah, I had a feeling that it was gonna feel different,
but, yeah, it's combining the two that's gonna be…
I think it'll come over time.
Perfect. One thing at a time, Paul. [laughs]
-Oh, my God. This is so weird seeing you. -[both laugh]
-Well, hopefully, weird in a good way. -[laughs] Yeah.
For sure.
I'm definitely excited.
It was one of the greatest moments of my life,
and I think it'll just keep going up from here.
Bye.

{\an8}I was really conflicted with Josh and Marshall,
{\an8}but Marshall basically was like, "Look, like, that's my girl."
{\an8}"She's coming home with me, and that's that."
{\an8}And I did not want to see Josh after that,
because Marshall is just the better choice for me.
He's gonna help me grow.
He is emotionally available.
He's able to handle my spiciness, my attitude.
He knows how to basically make sure that I'm feeling good and solid,
any single time that there's doubt.
So, I'm gonna have to really boss up if I'm gonna be with Marshall.
[Marshall] Hoo!

and I just was like, "Uh-huh, uh-huh. Right, right, right, right."

because it showed me that you cared.

I'm glad you chose me.
[laughs]
Jack, since day one, I've been about you.
And… [sighs]
From this moment on,
I promise to be about you.
I'm in love with you,
and I haven't even seen your face, and it is so crazy to say.
You are the wind in my sails.
You fan my flames, and you challenge me to be a better man every day.
And you will make me the happiest man…
on this planet…
if you marry me. Will you marry me, Jackie?
Of course I'll marry you. I'll marry you a thousand times.

I'm here with you, I promise.

The story with Ralph, I've had him since I was three.
I didn't really have any stability as a kid.
I would move, you know, every, like, three months…
sometimes, and I always was, like, in a new house, a new place, and,
um, Ralph was the one thing that I took with me
from place to place.
When my mom died, I, uh,
I found him in a box that she was still holding onto.
So, I thought I'd bring him with me for one more trip.
-[sighs] -Wait, this is so special.
-Yeah, it's pretty special. [chuckles] -[Irina] I think-- I think he likes me.
-[Zack] Well, that's good. -I'll keep him safe for you.
-Okay, did Bliss meet Ralphie too? -She did, yes.
[Irina] Okay, I don't feel special anymore.
-And I kind of wanna go home tonight. -[Zack] Stop!
I'm serious. I can't do this.
Like, I was talking to Micah today, and I was like,
"I'm gonna pack my suitcase. I'm ready to go home."
[Zack] Stop!
What? Like, I know that sounds so dramatic, but I'm telling you,
I can't sit there and wait for you to say, like, yes or no.
Like, I can't walk into Bliss making fucking cupcakes for you.
You know how hard that was yesterday?
I know who I am. I know what I stand for.
-I know. -[Irina] I know what I bring to the table.
And I know what I feel with you, and if you're still unsure about that
after ten straight hours of dating with Bliss,
I can't handle that.
-You have had ten straight hours with her. -Yeah.
I've been waiting all day to talk to you.
It has nothing to do with me, like…
not loving you. [sighs]
It has nothing to do with that.
Like, what's the difference between me and Bliss?
I know that I'm smart.
Like, I really think I'm a smart person.
I would say, like, more street smart, if that makes sense.
I have a business, all these things.
I know that I may not have the best vocabulary or, like,
these fancy words that I say to you to impress you.
-[Zack] Okay. -And maybe Bliss has those.
She's also way older than me.
Like, I'm 25 years old, and she's probably closer to your age,
and maybe you see her more as, like, wife material,
but, like, deep down in your heart,
like, what do you see in Bliss that you don't see in me?
I would love to know.
With you, the connection is just fire.
I'm so drawn to you.
And I think one concern I have is, I think
you're a little bit more…
-…vicious than I am. -[chuckles]
And, um,
Bliss, you know, she doesn't like you.
Um, that doesn't make you a bad person.
If you think something about me is not kind or vicious, like you said…
Like, I cannot believe you said that to me, 'cause it's a little shocking.
If that's what you feel talking from our conversation,
that says enough to me.
[Zack] So, let me finish.
I don't think you're vicious.
I think that if someone hurts you…
or you feel like someone has hurt someone you care about,
you will… hurt them back.
I-- I understand that.
She doesn't know who you are.
I know that you have this deep heart.
And I want you to know, like, how beautiful I really think you are…
because I do think you're incredibly beautiful on the inside.
I don't care how you fucking look like, Zack.
I don't care if you're a dweeb or a nerd or tall or short.
No matter what, like, I want you to know,
like, I'm always gonna think the world of you.
When I talk to you, I know that you love me.
And it's actually real,
and there's no strings attached to it.
Like, I trust you. Like, I really fucking trust you,
and that means more than
anything, really.
